downloadDescription: Microsoft is a reliable partner helping to protect valuable information in an era of constant targeted attacks and determined adversaries.
detailsSection: While mobile, social media, cloud services and big data are reshaping markets, business models, and the way people access information, these technology trends are also bringing security challenges and even new threats to public safety. This paper explores new technologies and the cyberthreats they pose, while also explaining how organizations can gain greater agility and boost resilience with cybersecurity measures. It outlines how Microsoft helps organizations address cybercrime and help protect valuable information in an era of constant targeted attacks and determined adversaries.
installInstructionSection: Please open this file with Adobe Acrobat Reader
